pr_title: Make ListenerDeclarationNode's type optional in syntax API

timeline.message: Make ListenerDeclarationNode's type optional in syntax API

timeline.bodyText: Should we directly extract ((ListenerDeclarationNode) node.parent()).typeDescriptor() instead?
